visible.title: Visible
visible.description: Sets whether the tooltip is visible or not

anchor.title: Anchor ID
anchor.description: The HTML ID of the element the tooltip is positioned relative to

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: The delay in milliseconds before a tooltip is shown after a hover event

position.title: Position
position.description: Controls the placement of the tooltip relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax
